xxl.core.pipes.scheduler
Interface Scheduler

All Known Implementing Classes:
StrategyScheduler, TimeSliceScheduler
public interface Scheduler

A Scheduler for Processors. SchedulableProcessors and UrgentProcessors can be treated separately.

Since:
1.1

Method Summary
 int getMaxSchedulingPriority()
          Returns the maximum value for priorities supported by this scheduler.
 int getMinSchedulingPriority()
          Returns the minimum value for priorities supported by this scheduler.
 int getNormSchedulingPriority()
          Returns the normal value for priorities supported by this scheduler.
 void reportBlocked(SchedulableProcessor proc)
          Called by a Processor when it is paused until wakeup, i.e. when it's pauseUntilWakeUp-Methode is called or its pause-Method is called with 0 as argument.
 void reportBlocked(SchedulableProcessor proc, long time)
          Called by a Processor when it's pause-Method is called with a positive argument.
 void reportBlocked(UrgentProcessor proc)
          Called by a Processor when it is paused until wakeup, i.e. when it's pauseUntilWakeUp-Methode is called or its pause-Method is called with 0 as argument.
 void reportBlocked(UrgentProcessor proc, long time)
          Called by a Processor when it's pause-Method is called with a positive argument.
 void reportPriorityChange(SchedulableProcessor proc)
          Called by a Processor when its setSchedulingPriority-Method has been called.
 void reportPriorityChange(UrgentProcessor proc)
          Called by a Processor when its setSchedulingPriority-Method has been called.
 void reportStart(SchedulableProcessor proc)
          Called by a Processor when it is started.
 void reportStart(UrgentProcessor proc)
          Called by a Processor when it is started.
 void reportTermination(SchedulableProcessor proc)
          Called by a Processor directly before it terminates.
 void reportTermination(UrgentProcessor proc)
          Called by a Processor directly before it terminates.
 void reportUnblocked(SchedulableProcessor proc)
          Called by a Processor when it's woken up by calling its wakeUp-Method after it had been put to sleep.
 void reportUnblocked(UrgentProcessor proc)
          Called by a Processor when it's woken up by calling its wakeUp-Method after it had been put to sleep.
 void schedule(SchedulableProcessor proc)
          When a SchedulableProcessors setScheduler-Method is called, it will call this method to register itself to this scheduler.
 void schedule(UrgentProcessor proc)
          When a UrgentProcessors setScheduler-Method is called it will call this method to register itself to this scheduler.
 void scheduleAfter(SchedulableProcessor proc, SchedulableProcessor predecessor)
          Causes this scheduler to schedule a Processor right after another one (optional operation).
 void stopScheduling(SchedulableProcessor proc)
          Causes this scheduler to stop scheduling a certain Processor.
 void stopScheduling(UrgentProcessor proc)
          Causes this scheduler to stop scheduling a certain Processor.

Returns:

schedule

void schedule(SchedulableProcessor proc)
When a SchedulableProcessors setScheduler-Method is called, it will call this method to register itself to this scheduler.

Parameters:
proc - the Processor to be scheduled
See Also:
Processor.setScheduler(Scheduler)

schedule

void schedule(UrgentProcessor proc)
When a UrgentProcessors setScheduler-Method is called it will call this method to register itself to this scheduler.

Parameters:
proc - the Processor to be scheduled
See Also:
Processor.setScheduler(Scheduler)

scheduleAfter

void scheduleAfter(SchedulableProcessor proc,
                   SchedulableProcessor predecessor)
Causes this scheduler to schedule a Processor right after another one (optional operation).

Parameters:
proc - the Processor to be scheduled
predecessor - the predecessing Processor
Throws:
UnsupportedOperationException - if this scheduler doesn't support this method
NoSuchElementException - if predecesssor is not registered to this scheduler

stopScheduling

void stopScheduling(SchedulableProcessor proc)
Causes this scheduler to stop scheduling a certain Processor.

Parameters:
proc - the Processor not to be scheduled anymore

stopScheduling

void stopScheduling(UrgentProcessor proc)
Causes this scheduler to stop scheduling a certain Processor.

Parameters:
proc - the Processor not to be scheduled anymore
